name: Aegis of the Immortal
description: The Immortal was said to own a shield that protected him from death itself.

abilities.name: Reincarnation
abilities.description: Brings its wielder to life at its death location with full health and mana after its effect delay.
notes: Whenever Roshan reclaims the Aegis, it disappears from the wielder's inventory
Grants the wielder bonus max health regeneration and max mana regeneration for a short duration
Neither resets the cooldown of abilities and items
Dispels the buff upon taking a 0-damage instance, except from self-damage sources and HP Removal sources
The countdown timer starts upon wielding the item, visible to everyone
The timer is independent of Roshan's respawn time

additionalInfo: The Aegis is consumed/disappears when one of the following happens, be it in a player's inventory, or still on the ground where Roshan dropped it:
Roshan respawns 8 â€“ 11 minutes after being killed
The Aegis wielder dies and reincarnates, consuming the Aegis
5 minutes pass since the Aegis was picked up by a hero, 4 minutes in Turbo Mode
This means it is impossible for multiple Aegis to exist in a match
